attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the influence of people from other countries from having a say on how our education system should be run, and what sort of lessons they want taught in our classrooms, We are the United Kingdom, we teach lessons in English and Welsh, If my children went to a school in another country,I would expect them to go with the values of that country, not start telling them how to run their school for the benefit of my children and beliefs.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
